failed_to_find_with_name.string: Failed to find online user with name:

not_in_combat.string: You are not in combat with anyone!

please_enter_help_syntax.string: Please enter "help" to see the syntax.

avatar_created.string:
Avatar created.
Please enter "edit-avatar shortdesc: [value]" to customize your character.

edit_avatar_longdesc.string: Enter "edit-avatar longdesc: [text]" to customize Long description

avatar_fully_customized.string: Your avatar is fully customized and ready to play.

attribute_to_be_updated.string: Attribute to be updated not found.

type_minigame_exit.string: Type 'minigame exit' to leave this game

you_are_not_in_any_minigames.string: You are not a player in any minigames.

invalid_move_or_not_your_turn.string: Invalid move or not your turn, is currently

has_challenged_to_minigame.string: has challenged you to a game, type 'minigame accept' to accept challenge.

invite_does_not_exist_or_full.string: Invite does not exist or game is full

world_interaction_commands.string:
World Interaction
--------------------------------------------------
move [direction]
look
look [object/username]
look [object/username] [object/username-index]
examine [object/username]

inventory_commands.string:
Inventory
--------------------------------------------------
use [object-in-inventory]
use [object-in-inventory] [object-index]
equip [object-in-inventory]
equip [object-in-inventory] [object-index]
pickup [object]
pickup [object] [object-index]
drop [object-in-inventory]
drop [object-in-inventory] [object-index]
put [container-name]
put [container-name] [container-index]  
move [direction]
--------------------------------------------------

minigame_commands.string:
Minigame
--------------------------------------------------
minigame challenge [username]
minigame accept
minigame join [username]
minigame move [location-of-piece-to-be-moved],[new-location]
--------------------------------------------------

combat_commands.string:
Combat
--------------------------------------------------
combat challenge [username]
combat accept
combat accept [username]
combat join [username]
attack
flee
cast [spell-name]
--------------------------------------------------

utility_commands.string:
Enter one of these to see more.
--------------------------------------------------
help Account
help Avatar
help Communication
help World-interaction
help Inventory
help Minigame
help Combat
--------------------------------------------------

one_of_you_already_in_combat.string: One of you are already in a combat!

you_were_challenged_to_combat.string: You were challenged to combat by

you_not_challenged_to_combat.string: You have not been challenged to combat.

minigame_chess_welcome_message.string:
Welcome to chess2019!. Some of the rules are modified from standard chess
such as checks/checkmates aren't declared, game ends when king is terminated, 
you cannot execute the En passant maneuver, when you reach the end of the board 
with a pawn your piece is promoted to a queen automatically. To input a move enter
the source coordinate followed by a , followed by another coordinate 
EX. a2,a4  is move piece at column A, row 2 to column A row 4.
Coordinates are printed on board for reference.

minigame_chess_king_not_dead.string: King isn't dead!, try calling isGameFinished first

minigame_chess_team_lower_won.string: team lowerCase has won the game

minigame_chess_team_upper_won.string: team upperCase has won the game

minigame_chess_playerid_no_match.string: No playerId matches the one assigned to this game???? you shouldn't see this message

this_dark_room_contains_number.string: This dark room contains only the number

this_secret_room_contains_number.string: This secret room contains only the number

invalid_username_create_message.string:
Error! Invalid username.
